posts:
{"id":"172338516139198_886547634718279","from":{"name":"Emad Mokhtar Habib","id":"10158372089300634"},"message":"Geeks I want a good tuts or source to know more about Django and answer these questions:
1- What goes to ModelManager and what goes to the Model?
2- Where to put my validation? In Model or in ModelForm? and what about the REST APIs where I can place my validations?
3- Same as 2 but for business logic?

As recommendation and as I found: put your business logic and validation in the Model but is there any full guide or samples?
I'm building an APIs so I won't use Django Views nor Forms and most of TDD tuts are for Views and Forms and tuts or source for that too?

A lot of question but as you get deep into Django will find there are many ways to do things not perfect/one way to do things and this for me is confusing","caption":null,"description":null,"created_time":"2015-01-27T01:12:37+11:00","total_likes":2,"total_comments":3}

{"id":"172338516139198_886998048006571","from":{"name":"Ahmed Al-Amir","id":"10155179919799180"},"message":"Cut off from the Internet, young Cubans have quietly linked thousands of computers into a hidden network that stretches miles across Havana, letting them chat with friends, play games and download hit movies in a mini-replica of the online world that most can't access.","caption":"hosted.ap.org","description":null,"created_time":"2015-01-28T01:17:32+11:00","total_likes":2,"total_comments":0}
